title: The Aquarium
overview: Georgia Aquarium, which plays a crucial role in aquatic conservation throughout the world, opens its doors to global audiences with unprecedented access to the aquatic animals and inner-workings of the Western Hemisphere's largest aquarium. The Aquarium introduces and shares the stories of the amazing animals who call the 10 million gallons of water at the Georgia Aquarium home, including rescued southern sea otters, endangered African penguins, rescued California sea lions, and manta rays, among others.
